Package ivory.data

Provides data structures needed for indexing and retrieval.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CfTable Interface to object that keeps track of the collection frequency of each term in the collection.
DfTable Interface to object that keeps track of the document frequency of each term in the collection.
PostingsList Interface representing a postings list, which contains a list of individual postings.
PostingsReader Interface for a postings reader.
 

Class Summary
CfTableArray Array-based implementation of CfTable.
DfTableArray Array-based implementation of DfTable.
DocLengthTable Object that keeps track of the length of each document in the collection.
Posting Object representing a posting.
PostingsListDocSortedNonPositional Object representing a document-sorted postings list that does not hold positional information for terms.
PostingsListDocSortedNonPositional.PostingsReader PostingsReader for PostingsListDocSortedNonPositional.
PostingsListDocSortedPositional Object representing a document-sorted postings list that holds positional information for terms.
PostingsListDocSortedPositional.PostingsReader PostingsReader for PostingsListDocSortedPositional.
PostingsListScoreSorted Object representing a score-sorted postings list.
PostingsListScoreSorted.PostingsReader PostingsReader for PostingsListScoreSorted.
PrefixEncodedForwardIndex  
PrefixEncodedGlobalStats  
PrefixEncodedTermSet  
ProximityPostingsListOrderedWindow  
ProximityPostingsListUnorderedWindow  
ProximityPostingsReader  
 

Package ivory.data Description

Provides data structures needed for indexing and retrieval.
